vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
TokenDestructible.destroy (TokenDestructible.sol#112-124) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (TokenDestructible.sol#118)

vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
TokenDestructible.destroy has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (TokenDestructible.sol#117)

vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
TokenDestructible.destroy has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(owner,balance) (TokenDestructible.sol#118)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Ownable.renounceOwnership (TokenDestructible.sol#44-47) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Ownable.transferOwnership (TokenDestructible.sol#53-55) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.totalSupply (TokenDestructible.sol#79) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.balanceOf (TokenDestructible.sol#80) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.transfer (TokenDestructible.sol#81) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function allowance(address _ocwner, address _spender) public view returns (uint256);
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.allowance (TokenDestructible.sol#82) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success);
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.approve (TokenDestructible.sol#83) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool);
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.transferFrom (TokenDestructible.sol#84) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: TokenDestructible.destroy (TokenDestructible.sol#112-124) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (TokenDestructible.sol#53) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Ownable._transferOwnership' (TokenDestructible.sol#61-65) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable._transferOwnership (TokenDestructible.sol#61) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_tokens' of TokenDestructible.destroy (TokenDestructible.sol#112) is not in mixedCase
